title: Live Trading Room
content: Get access to our live trading room. Watch as a real trader shows you how to work a trade. Ask questions and get support on your trades.

title: Community Discord
content: Access to resources that help streamline your analysis. Discuss analysis and trade ideas with fellow traders. Take part in special events with like-minded people.

title: Besh2oke Training
content: Understand how analyse macro and micro economic data. Discover the power of understanding investor psyhcology. Learn to predict market moves hours before they happen.

title: Market Insights
content: Check out the daily market analysis to keep your edge against the big money. Get insights on trade strategy before markets open.

title: Dedicated Support Team
content: Whatever vour question, subscription enquries, course related support or follow up. We are here for you every step of the way!
